hero_section.title: A Revolutionary New School That Invests in You
hero_section.description: Lambda School is a 9 month, immersive program that gives you the tools and training you need to launch your new career—from the comfort of your own home.

list1.title: Live Classes From Anywhere
list1.subtitle: Take live, structured classes from the convenience of wherever, with instant, one-on-one help whenever you need it.

list2.title: World-Class Instructional Staff
list2.subtitle: We built a curriculum with hands-on, real-world experience taught by instructors from Google, Apple, Blizzard, and more.

list3.title: Pay Nothing Until You Make It
list3.subtitle: No loans, no debt, and no up-front tuition. You'll pay a percentage of income after you're hired, but only if you're making at least $50k/year.

section2.title: An Education That Banks On You
section2.description: We believe that education should invest in you, not the other way around. As a Lambda student, you pay nothing until you’re earning $50k or more. And if you don’t, it’s free.
section2.img_text: I never thought I was the type that could land a high-paying tech job, but I just accepted a high-paying job as a software engineer. And I haven’t paid Lambda School anything so far.
